price: 107. Arrinkaasi waxaa ugu wacan inay jecel yihiin nolosha adduunkan wax ka badan Aakhirada, iyo inaan Alle hanuunin qoloda gaalada ah (madaxa adag).
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱسۡتَحَبُّواْ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا عَلَى ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahumu is'taḥabbū al-ḥayata al-dun'yā ʿalā al-ākhirati wa-anna al-laha lā yahdī al-qawma al-kāfirīna
